com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4

Interface ShellStream.OnStreamListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ShellStream
    Deprecated. 
    This has been deprecated along with it's parent ShellStream. It has been replaced by ShellStreamer.StreamListener and ShellStreamer.ConnectionListener to be used with the new ShellStreamer class.

    public static interface ShellStream.OnStreamListener
    This interface is used to read the input from the shell.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStreamDied()
      Deprecated. 
      This is called when the shell connection dies.
      void onStreamInput(String outputLine)
      Deprecated. 
      This is called on each line from the shell input stream.
      void onStreamStart()
      Deprecated. 
      This is called before a command is sent to the shell output stream.
      void onStreamStop(Integer resultCode)
      Deprecated. 
      This is called after all shell input has been processed.

    • Method Detail

      • onStreamStart

        void onStreamStart()
        Deprecated. 
        This is called before a command is sent to the shell output stream.

      • onStreamInput

        void onStreamInput(String outputLine)
        Deprecated. 
        This is called on each line from the shell input stream.
        Parameters:
        inputLine - The current shell input line that is being processed

      • onStreamStop

        void onStreamStop(Integer resultCode)
        Deprecated. 
        This is called after all shell input has been processed.
        Parameters:
        exitCode - The exit code returned by the shell

      • onStreamDied

        void onStreamDied()
        Deprecated. 
        This is called when the shell connection dies. This can either be because a command executed 'exit', or if the method ShellStream.destroy() was called.
